1: <pb/>E u tzij ri ajawinel Lemuel aj Mas, <pb/><t>ri xtijobex rech rumal ri u nan.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Wal, qui wächinic ri nu c'u'x,</t> <t>tzelebal qui wäch tak ri nu bochi'nic</t> <t>ri xuya' ri Dios,</t> <t>¿jas ta chic ri quincuin ta</t> <t>chi che u bixic chawe?</t>
3: <t>Chi maq'uis ri a chuk'ab</t> <t>cuc' tak ri ixokib,</t> <t>u mac c'u quech ri ixokib</t> <t>quebetzeletaj tak ri ajawinelab.</t>
4: <t>Man utz ta c'ut, Lemuel,</t> <t>chi ri ajawinel</t> <t>xukuje' tak ri e k'atal tak tzij</t> <t>cacuq'uiaj u wa'l uva</t> <t>xukuje' ri c'a tak uq'uia',</t>
5: <t>cuya' c'u ri' cäsach ri pixab</t> <t>pa qui jolom</t> <t>cäquijech'obisaj c'u u k'atic tzij</t> <t>paquiwi' ri man nimak ta qui k'ij.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Chaya' can ri u wa'l uva</t> <t>xukuje' ri c'a tak uq'uia'</t> <t>chque ri quebisonic</t> <t>chque ri man cäquirik ta chic</t> <t>jas cäquibano;</t>
7: <t>¡chcuq'uiaj u wa'l uva</t> <t>manataj chic chque ri qui mebayil</t> <t>xukuje' ri qui rikoj tak c'ax!</t>
8: <pb/><t>Co chatch'aw che qui q'uexwäch</t> <t>ri man co ta quech'awic;</t> <t>¡chebato' ri man quecuin taj</t> <t>cäquito' quib!</t>
9: <t>Co chatch'awok,</t> <t>chabana' c'u suq'uil chque;</t> <t>¡chebato' ri mebayib</t> <t>xukuje' ri man nimak ta qui k'ij!</t>
10: <t>Mayibalalaj ixok,</t> <t>¿la ma ta c'ax u rikic?</t> <t>¡C'o na rajil chquiwäch</t> <t>tak ri je'lalaj abaj ri perl!</t>
11: <t>Ri rachajil</t> <t>kas cujiquiba' u c'u'x chrij,</t> <t>man c'o ta jun k'ij</t> <t>ri ma ta c'o u ch'äcoj.</t>
12: <t>Quebuya' nimak tak utzil</t> <t>che ri rachajil</t> <t>conojel ri k'ij re ri u c'aslemal.</t>
13: <t>Cäbe che u tzucuxic rismal chij</t> <t>xukuje' lino ruc' c'ut quicotemal</t> <t>quebuchacuj tak chac</t> <t>cuc' tak ri e u k'ab.</t>
14: <t>Ri je ta ne jun jucub</t> <t>quech ajc'ayib ri naj</t> <t>quebuc'ama' wi ulok</t> <t>ri jastak ri quebajwataj che.</t>
15: <t>C'ä maja' casakaric cäwalij</t> <t>che qui tzukic ri ral</t> <t>xukuje' ri e u pataninelab.</t>
16: <t>Cäbe che rilic jun ulew culok' c'ut,</t> <t>cuc' tak ri u ch'äcoj quebutic tak uva.</t>
17: <t>Cuxim ri u xe' u pam</t> <t>che u cojic u chuk'ab</t> <t>ruc' c'u chajin anima' coc</t> <t>che u banic ri chac.</t>
18: <t>Coc il cärilij ri c'ayij</t> <t>rech utz quelic,</t> <t>cächacun chak'ab</t> <t>c'ä canajtin na ri ak'ab.</t>
19: <t>Quebucoj ri u k'ab che bätz'inic</t> <t>xukuje' cäquemenic.</t>
20: <t>Amak'el c'o cuya' chque ri mebayib</t> <t>xukuje' chque ri c'o qui rajawaxic.</t>
21: <t>Man c'o ta cubij u c'u'x</t> <t>chque ri ral aretak cäkaj ri tew,</t> <t>conojel c'u ri ral</t> <t>qui cojom pimak tak qui k'u'.</t>
22: <t>Kas are' quequemow tak catz'iak,</t> <t>are' c'u quebucoj</t> <t>ri ch'uch'ujalaj tak atz'iak</t> <t>che ratz'iak.</t>
23: <t>Ri rachajil sibalaj etamatal u wäch</t> <t>chupam ri tinimit,</t> <t>are jun chquixo'l ri tatayib</t> <t>ri nimak qui k'ij pa ri ulew.</t>
24: <t>We ixok ri'</t> <t>quebuban tak u pam atz'iak</t> <t>xukuje' tak pas</t> <t>ri quebuc'ayij chque tak ri ajc'ayib.</t>
25: <t>Cuc'ac'arisaj ri u chuk'ab</t> <t>xukuje' nim ilic,</t> <t>man coc ta il che ri k'ij re chwek.</t>
26: <t>Amak'el catzijon ruc' no'j,</t> <t>ruc' c'u lok'ok'ebal c'uxaj</t> <t>quebuya' tak ri e u tijonic.</t>
27: <t>Coc il rech ronojel utz</t> <t>cabin pa ri rachoch,</t> <t>mawi jumul cutij ri man u ch'äcom taj.</t>
28: <t>Ri e ral xukuje' ri rachajil</t> <t>cäquiya' u k'ij cäquibij c'u che:</t>
29: <t>“Utzalaj tak ixokib</t> <t>sibalaj e q'ui e c'olic,</t> <t>are' c'u ri at</t> <t>at ri sibalaj at utz na</t> <t>chquiwäch conojel.”</t>
30: <t>Ri wikbal tak ib</t> <t>xak e jun banoj tzij,</t> <t>ri je'lical xak oc'owel,</t> <t>are' c'u ri ixok</t> <t>ri nim cäril wi ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>ya'tal u ya'ic u k'ij.</t>
31: <t>¡Chiya' u k'ij</t> <t>chuwäch ronojel ri tinimit!</t> <t>¡Chiya' u k'ij</t> <t>rumal ronojel ri u banom!</t>
